rubric: PCOD with complete hormonal silence (anovulation + amenorrhoea)
modality: No cycle for months; no signs of ovulation
notes: Oophorinum often key when axis fully inactive

rubric: PCOD after suppression with hormonal pills
modality: Symptoms began or worsened after contraceptives
notes: Thuja/Folliculinum often unlock cycle post-drug suppression

rubric: PCOD with chronic constipation and bloating
modality: Heaviness, gas, sluggish bowel with irregular cycle
notes: Digestive–hormonal link; Lyc often key

rubric: PCOD with mental dullness, fatigue, and aversion to work
modality: Cycle absent, patient feels mentally drained
notes: Phos-acid useful in worn-out constitutions

rubric: PCOD with strong craving for cold drinks and ice
modality: Cycle delayed or irregular; heat aggravates
notes: Craving pattern reveals miasmatic layer

rubric: PCOD with acne, oily skin, and facial hair (hirsutism)
modality: Facial hair, oily scalp/skin, cycle irregular
notes: Oleum jecoris especially useful in metabolic-hormonal types

rubric: PCOD with intense irritability and mood swings before menses
modality: Worse 1 week before flow; better once menses start
notes: Common PMS cluster in hormone-suppressed types

rubric: PCOD with craving for sweets, emotional eating, and guilt
modality: Cycle irregular, worsened by diet-binge-emotional cycle
notes: Linked to trauma or rejection; emotional comfort eating

rubric: PCOD with hair fall, especially from scalp vertex or crown
modality: Hair fall worsens near cycle or after long delay
notes: Associated with androgens or thyroid-ovarian dysfunction

rubric: PCOD with history of suppressed sexual desire or trauma
modality: Cycle irregular or missing since traumatic memory
notes: Seen in PCOD after abuse, guilt, or fear of intimacy

rubric: PCOD with irregular menses and left ovarian pain
modality: Left-sided congestion or ache before/during periods
notes: Lachesis often top remedy in left-ovarian PCOD pathology

rubric: PCOD in women with strong sexual desire but suppressed expression
modality: Suppressed libido leads to ovarian congestion, delayed menses
notes: Linked to shame, guilt, or family/societal pressure

rubric: PCOD with obesity and chilliness
modality: Cycle irregular with weight gain, sluggishness, cold body
notes: Calcarea-type PCOD seen in early youth and hypothyroid overlap

rubric: PCOD with extreme dryness of skin, hair, and mucosa
modality: Dry scalp, dry lips, brittle nails, cracked heels + irregular menses
notes: Points to internal heat and poor assimilation

rubric: PCOD with extreme sensitivity to cold air and menses suppression
modality: Menses delayed or stopped in winter, cold exposure
notes: Cold-reactive constitutions with latent metabolic slowness

rubric: PCOD with restlessness, ambition, and suppressed anxiety
modality: Driven but exhausted patients, sleep disturbed
notes: Often found in perfectionist PCOD types

rubric: PCOD with sleep disturbance and frequent waking
modality: Sleep broken; worse full moon; cycle irregular
notes: Links PCOD to pineal–hypothalamic rhythm disruption

rubric: PCOD with thyroid imbalance (TSH ↑, T3/T4 ↓)
modality: Delayed menses, hair fall, cold body, fatigue
notes: Hypothyroid–PCOD overlap is frequent

rubric: PCOD with pelvic congestion and bearing-down sensation
notes: Classic sign of sacral–ovarian blood stagnation

rubric: PCOD with emotional suppression and inability to express anger
modality: Polycystic state arises with repressed personality
notes: Seen in highly controlled or emotionally repressed women

rubric: PCOD after suppressed grief or betrayal in relationship
modality: Menses irregular after heartbreak or trauma
notes: Cycle reflects wounded self-worth and trust

rubric: PCOD with acne aggravated by sweets or fried food
modality: Greasy acne worsens diet-related; menses irregular
notes: Metabolic–sebaceous axis expression

rubric: PCOD with extreme aversion to company and desire for solitude
notes: Constitutional introversion and emotional block

rubric: PCOD with burning heat in soles and palms before menses
modality: Inner heat buildup releases as flow starts
notes: Seen in congestive premenstrual states

rubric: PCOD in artistic, sensitive women with blocked creativity
modality: Ovarian function stalls when creativity blocked
notes: Somatic expression of suppressed inspiration

rubric: PCOD with strong craving for salt, spicy, and pickles
modality: Craving guides remedy even if no flow appears
notes: Salt-craving = Nat-m / Sepia guiding symptom

rubric: PCOD with headaches before or during flow
notes: Cyclical headaches with endocrine background

rubric: PCOD with right-sided ovarian pain
modality: Right ovary congested or tender before period
notes: Lyc/Apis indicate congestive vascular ovary

rubric: PCOD in women with controlling or rigid personalities
notes: Seen in high-achieving but emotionally constricted types

rubric: PCOD alternating with skin eruptions or eczema
notes: Suppression of skin leads to ovarian block

rubric: PCOD with offensive, dark vaginal discharge
modality: Foul discharge worse at ovulation or menses
notes: Points to chronic endometrial–ovarian toxin state

rubric: PCOD with emotional numbness or detachment from body
notes: Seen in trauma survivors, suppressed empaths

rubric: PCOD worse after suppression of skin eruptions (topical creams)
modality: Skin suppression redirects miasm to ovaries
notes: Boger and Allen confirm inner–outer disease shift

rubric: PCOD with excessive perspiration and offensive sweat
modality: Sweaty palms, soles, axilla; odor marked
notes: Detox blockage often shows via skin and ovary

rubric: PCOD with history of family cancer, diabetes, or infertility
modality: Inherited miasmatic load reflects as PCOD
notes: Family miasm plays deep role in endocrine block

rubric: PCOD with anger suppressed during teenage years
modality: PCOD onset around adolescence with emotional shutdown
notes: Hormonal axis freezes from suppressed rebellion

rubric: PCOD with delayed menarche and irregular first cycles
modality: First 1–3 years of cycle very irregular
notes: Suggests latent constitutional weakness

rubric: PCOD with alternating constipation and diarrhea
notes: Cycle often worse with GI irregularity

rubric: PCOD with frequent urination and incomplete emptying
modality: Uterine pressure or congestion affects bladder
notes: Common overlap in pelvic congestion states

rubric: PCOD with suppressed sexuality and disgust for own body
modality: Patient rejects her body or feels impure
notes: Seen in trauma survivors or over-sanitized upbringings

rubric: PCOD with delayed ovulation and long cycles (40+ days)
modality: Menses come once in 1.5 to 2 months
notes: Common in insulin-resistant PCOD with cysts

rubric: PCOD with constant sensation of pelvic heaviness or fullness
modality: Worse standing or walking; relieved lying on abdomen
notes: Suggestive of uterine congestion or cystic enlargement

rubric: PCOD with craving for indigestible things (pica)
modality: Craves chalk, soil, raw rice; cycle irregular
notes: Suggestive of deep assimilation issues and miasmatic anemia

rubric: PCOD in girls abused or shamed for sexual expression
modality: Cycle freezes or goes irregular after trauma
notes: Often associated with genital self-rejection or chronic guilt

rubric: PCOD with tendency to form cysts in other organs
modality: Cystic formations in ovaries, breasts, thyroid etc.
notes: Systemic tendency toward ductal blockage or glandular stasis

rubric: PCOD with intense craving for chocolate and stimulants
modality: Emotional eating to lift suppressed energy or depression
notes: Often reveals emotional suppression and depleted dopamine axis

rubric: PCOD in competitive, overachieving girls with cycle suppression
modality: Ambition overrides femininity; menses become secondary
notes: Common in girls with perfectionism, school stress, comparison

rubric: PCOD with history of vaccination aggravation
modality: Menses irregular post-HPV, MMR, or COVID vaccines
notes: Vaccinosis is major overlooked trigger; Thuja key nosode

rubric: PCOD with sudden stoppage of menses after trauma
modality: Flow suppressed after grief, shock, fear, loss

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea better by bending double
modality: Cramping, colicky pains better by pressure and flexion
notes: Colocynthis is most confirmatory when pain compels patient to bend forward with restlessness

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with nausea or vomiting
modality: Nausea, retching, or faintness during menses
notes: Cocculus in sensitive, exhausted women; Ipecac in constant nausea with clean tongue

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with backache extending to thighs
modality: Severe lumbosacral pain radiating to inner thighs
notes: Kali-c has stitching pain; Bell: congestive pain

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea worse before flow begins
modality: Cramping or irritable pain better once menses starts
notes: Chamomilla in oversensitive, irritable women; Mag-p for neuralgic pain

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with bearing-down pain
modality: Sensation as if pelvic organs will escape
notes: Sepia classic for uterine prolapse feeling; Murex = intense sexual energy with dragging pain

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with dark, clotted blood
modality: Dark, offensive, clotted flow with pain
notes: Lach: left-sided + better flow; Sabina: pain from sacrum to pubes

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with faintness and cold sweat
notes: Verat: icy cold limbs, collapse; Secale: better cold

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea in nervous, sensitive girls

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea from left ovary pain
modality: Pain predominantly in left ovary, worse before menses
notes: Lachesis is highly left-sided, worse before flow; Apis has stinging pain and ovarian congestion

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with pain extending down thighs
modality: Radiating pain from uterus to thighs, spasmodic
notes: Belladonna has congestive, throbbing pain; Kali-c: stitching, worse during menses

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with suppressed anger or grief
modality: Pain aggravated by emotional suppression, sighing
notes: Ignatia: hysterical grief; Staph: silent suffering with pelvic tension

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with diarrhea or loose stools
modality: Loose stools or weakness during menses
notes: Gelsemium with trembling and drowsiness; Nux moschata has dryness and drowsy colic

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with flow scanty but painful
modality: Minimal flow with severe spasmodic pain
notes: Cimic: rheumatic, nervous dysmenorrhoea; Puls: changeable and emotional

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with congestive pelvic pain
modality: Congestive, throbbing pain in pelvis, aggravated by heat and movement
notes: Belladonna for sudden onset, flushed face; Aconite for anxiety with heat and restlessness

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with intermenstrual spotting
modality: Pain between cycles with spotting, often hormonal imbalance
notes: Thlaspi is best for uterine congestion with clots and prolonged bleeding

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea with hypogastric heaviness
modality: Sensation of weight in lower abdomen; dragging pain
notes: Sepia and Aurum: heaviness with indifference or depression

rubric: Dysmenorrhoea in hormonal imbalance (PCOD/estrogen dominance)
modality: Irregular cycles, PMS symptoms, emotional volatility
notes: Folliculinum regulates hormonal cycle; useful in PCOS or ovulatory suppression

modality: Burning uterine pain with restlessness or offensive discharge
notes: Ars alb: anxious, restless, chilly with burning; Kreos: acrid discharge, ulceration

modality: Headache synchronous with flow, better lying down

modality: Heavy bleeding with cramping and fibroid-related pain

modality: Menses delayed or painful during grief, sadness, or conflict
notes: Ignatia in acute grief; Nat mur in long-held grief with introversion
